In addition to the electronic services specified in Paragraph 1 of this Article, the Lithuanian Spatial Information Portal may also provide electronic services for the performance of functions related to spatial data sets, as well as for the performance of spatial data processing activities specified in the legal acts of state and municipal institutions.

The Regulations of the Lithuanian open data portal sets conditions for opening data and managing requests on this portal. The Lithuanian open data portal https://data.gov.lt/ allows businesses and the public to conveniently receive and use data managed by public sector institutions on a one-stop basis. It is envisaged that data not published on this portal will be mandatory to open if such a request from data user is received and such data is not confidential. The responsible institution has to answer the requester within 5 working days from the date of submission of the request, what decision has been taken regarding the opening and submission of the requested data to the portal. The essence is simpler and faster communication between business and public sector data holders, as all communication takes place on the portal itself, without the need to write separate requests or inquiries.
